alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 1:40AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Duchesne County through 230 AM MDT... At 140 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles south of Myton, or 19 miles southeast of Duchesne, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Roosevelt and Myton. This includes US Route 40 between mile markers 104 and 107, and between mile markers 112 and 115. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Basin
